name: Robot Care
description:
Robot Care

A game made for Ludum Dare with the help of my daughter.

You are a scientist trying to keep their trusty robot companion alive long enough for the fusion reactor to come online so the robot can go out and save the world!

Give the robot the deliveries of fuel, batteries and teddy bears to keep the gauge on it's chest at an optimum level until the fusion reactor comes online.

Programming by me (Gavin), art music and sound by my daughter Iris.

Made for the Ludum Dare theme "Keep It Alive".
